name: GeometricMD
tagline: A Geometric Method for Molecular Dynamics based on the Maupertuis principle. A parallel Python script which performs molecular dynamics calculations solving transition path problems. It uses the Atomistic Simulation Environment to describe molecular systems and their calculator to determine forces and potential energies.
body:
# GMFMD
A Geometric Method for Molecular Dynamics (GMFMD). A parallel Python script which performs molecular dynamics calculations solving transition path problems. It uses the Atomistic Simulation Environment to describe molecular systems and their calculator to determine forces and potential energies.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
